email_subject: Portland Fundamental Analysis Strategy Meeting Info
email_body: PLEASE NOTE: Call-in information will change weekly. The call-in information for the Tuesday Portland Fundamental Analysis Strategy Meeting is as follows: Date: Tuesday, 11/20/01 Time: 1:00 p.m. (PST) Dial In Number: 888-296-1938 Participant Code: 805775 If you have any questions, please contact Kathy Sheppard at 503-464-7698. Thanks.
